title: LF Ranked Friends
body: Hi guys i'm currently a silver 4 (was silver 2 :( )  support main, i can also JG and Mid but support is my best, i'm looking for some chill people to play norms,ranked or flex with :) i currently have a broken leg so i have about 3 weeks free time left of healing and i'm getting quite lonely haha. So why not add me and maybe we can climb together :D
